sentences.cn: 道德上进退两难的窘境

sentences.en: He was thrown into a dilemma.
I am in a dilemma whether to do maths or English.
sentences.cn: 我左右为难,不知是做数学还是写英语.

sentences.en: I am on the horns of a dilemma about the matter.
It was an insoluble dilemma and one which I could do nothing about.
sentences.cn: 那是个无法解决的两难局面，我无计可施。

sentences.en: Many women are faced with the dilemma of choosing between work and family commitments.
sentences.cn: 许多女性面临着出去工作还是照顾家庭的两难境地。

sentences.en: Mercifully some one arrived upon the scene to extricate him from the dilemma and assume the responsibility.
sentences.cn: 幸亏有个人来替他解围,把责任包揽下来.

sentences.en: She describes her own moral dilemma in making the film.
sentences.cn: 她讲述了拍摄这部电影过程中她在道义上所面临的两难选择。

sentences.en: She was in a dilemma as to whether to go or stay.
sentences.cn: 去还是留,她真是左右为难.

sentences.en: She was in a dilemma whether to stay at school or get a job.
sentences.cn: 是继续求学还是找工作,她感到难以决定.

sentences.en: The bird is caught on the horns of a dilemma. Should it attack the predator, even though it then risks its own life? Or should it get out while the going is good?
sentences.cn: 这只鸟进退维谷。是应该冒着生命危险攻击捕食者呢？还是应该及早逃命？

sentences.en: The dilemma presented quite a poser.
They try to find a way out of their dilemma.
This placed Robert Kennedy in a dilemma.
sentences.cn: 这让罗伯特·肯尼迪陷入了两难的境地。

sentences.en: Tom thought himself into a dilemma.
Tu Wei - yueh saw his dilemma at a glance and burst out laughing.
sentences.cn: 屠维岳 一眼瞧去就明白了,蓦地就狂笑起来.

sentences.en: You place me in sth. of a dilemma.
sentences.cn: 你真叫我有点进退两难.

words.tran_cn: 困境；进退两难；两刀论法

phrases.tran_cn: 道德上的左右为难；道德两难处境；伦理两难
囚徒困境，囚徒困境悖论

trans.tran_en: a situation in which it is very difficult to decide what to do, because all the choices seem equally good or equally bad
